languages.text: "Рад{mf||а} знакомству. Махарию повезло с такой прекрасной женой. Возможно, больше, чем вам с ним".

traits.locale_text: "Рад{mf|а} знакомству. Махарию повезло с такой прекрасной женой. Возможно больше, чем вам с ним".

languages.text: "It is my pleasure. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."
languages.original_text: "Рад{mf||а} знакомству. Махарию повезло с такой прекрасной женой. Возможно, больше, чем вам с ним".

traits.locale_text: "Charmed. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."
"Charmed. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."
"It is my pleasure. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."
"It is my pleasure. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."
"It is my pleasure. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."

languages.text: 「こちらこそ。こんなに美しい妻をめとったマハリウスは果報者だ。おそらく、嫁いできたあなたよりもずっと幸せだろう」
languages.original_text: "It is my pleasure. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."

traits.locale_text: 「こちらこそ。こんなに美しい妻をめとったマハリウスは果報者だ。おそらく、嫁いできたあなたよりもずっと幸せだろう」

languages.text: “能见到你，我很荣幸。马卡里乌斯真幸运，能娶到这么漂亮的妻子，或许比你嫁给他更幸运。”
languages.original_text: "It is my pleasure. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."

traits.locale_text: “能见到你，我很荣幸。马卡里乌斯真幸运，能娶到这么漂亮的妻子，或许比你嫁给他更幸运。”

languages.text: «El honor es mío. Macharius tiene suerte de tener una esposa de su belleza. Quizás más que usted de tenerlo a él».
languages.original_text: "It is my pleasure. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."

traits.locale_text: «El honor es mío. Macharius tiene suerte de tener una esposa de su belleza. Quizás más que usted de tenerlo a él».

languages.text: « Tout le plaisir est pour moi. Macharius a bien de la chance d'avoir une femme d'une telle beauté. Je doute que vous puissiez en dire autant de lui. »
languages.original_text: "It is my pleasure. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."

traits.locale_text: « Tout le plaisir est pour moi. Macharius a bien de la chance d'avoir une femme d'une telle beauté. Je doute que vous puissiez en dire autant de lui. »

languages.text: "Und mir ist es ein Vergnügen. Macharius kann sich glücklich schätzen, eine so schöne Frau zu haben. Vielleicht glücklicher als Ihr, ihn zu haben."
languages.original_text: "It is my pleasure. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."

traits.locale_text: "Und mir ist es ein Vergnügen. Macharius kann sich glücklich schätzen, eine so schöne Frau zu haben. Vielleicht glücklicher als Ihr, ihn zu haben."

languages.text: "O zevk bana ait. Macharius, böylesine güzel bir eşi olduğu için çok şanslı. Seni hak etmiyor."
languages.original_text: "It is my pleasure. Macharius is lucky to have such a beautiful wife. Perhaps more so than you are to have him."

traits.locale_text: "O zevk bana ait. Macharius, böylesine güzel bir eşi olduğu için çok şanslı. Seni hak etmiyor."
